The expert: s verdict confirms that Pelosi did visit San Francisco's Chinatown on February 24th, where she delivered a message that there was no reason for tourists or locals to stay away from the area due to coronavirus concerns. Pelosi emphasized that precautions had been taken and the city was on top of the situation.
The claim that Pelosi: s Twitter account deleted a tweet showing her encouraging tourism to Chinatown after the U.S. border was closed to China is debunked by archives, which do not document such a tweet being posted and deleted.
